front.title: Security requirements for the Unidirectional Lightweight Encapsulation (ULE) protocol

abstract.t: This document provides a threat analysis and derives security requirements for MPEG-2 transmission links using the Unidirectional Lightweight Encapsulation (ULE). It also provides the motivation for ULE link level security. This work is intended as a work item of the ipdvb WG, and contributions are sought from the IETF on this topic.
